NOT_ASSIGNED.title: Contributor Assigned
NOT_ASSIGNED.description: A contributor has been assigned to this issue. You can find their contact details below. If the contributor takes too long to respond or if the user isn't providing feedback, you can unassign them.

TO_REVIEW.title: To review
TO_REVIEW.description: The issue is currently awaiting review by a lead. Please check the contributor's work and decide whether to approve or reject the issue. Your feedback is important to ensure the quality of the resolution.
